title: Shateigashira

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game or when you become a Shateigashira, you gain the name of a player and their role.
- When you attack that player with the Factional Kill, your attack is upgraded to Powerful.
- If that player visits you, they are dealt a powerful attack and cleaned. (This happens in additional to your factional kill.)
- Each time you kill the listed player, gain the name and role of another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players will know they're being hunted by the Shateigashira
- Factional kill
- Factional chat

desc:

*The shateigashira were the local bosses of individual gangs.*
